title: ENR Russia sera décoté au 20 janvier
cleaned_sentences: Geneva (AWP) - The participation company ENR Russia announced on Friday the validation of its request for decline by six Exchange Regulation.
The last day of actions trading is set for January 17 and the cancellation on January 20, a statement said.
The company located in Geneva had requested the radiation of all the actions to the carrier listed on the Swiss stock exchange with a nominal value of 12.40 Swiss francs each.
During an extraordinary general assembly in December, the shareholders had given their green light for the garment.
At the end of 2024, ENR Russia was taken over by the Valartis financial group which held, after its buyout offer, 99.76% of the company's shares.
As part of the operation, Valartis gives up his minority participation in Athris Holding by Georg von Opel and receives in return 892,703 actions ENR Russia and a cash payment.
Athris Holding, listed on the Bern BX Stock Exchange, held a participation of a good third party in ENR Russia, according to previous data.
